channel.title: Dementedx awesome content lots of players
channel.description:
hey this is my server dementedx www.rswebclients.com/play/dementedx what i have added awesome shops ready made economy custom boss drops custom point system level point shop all skills work summoning fixed all pouches work added nomad added torva and dung items added corp theiving stalls vote shop custom home donor zone donator shops ::food ::veng ::pot ::barrage donator chest and much more.........
to come in v2 nex boss with drops new point system npc kill shop tokkul shop rares shop donator point shop ::vote ::donate and much more.......
in v3 grand exchange (fully working no bugs) customs death cape coloured phats ornate katana and light sabres make a pk version of my server and add a new custom pk area (pyramids of zen)
here are some pics
[img]http://mob1352.photobucket.com/albums/q656/dementedxrsps/theive_zps424d6fde.jpg[/img]
[img]http://mob1352.photobucket.com/albums/q656/dementedxrsps/home_zps7df56f2b.jpg[/img]
[img]http://mob1352.photobucket.com/albums/q656/dementedxrsps/shop_zpse68acaa3.jpg[/img]
